answers.answer: Hi!I am sorry to hear about your medical problems. Yes, if there is curvature in the lower spine then burning thigh pain can be due to pinched nerves caused by this curvature. Other cause could be peripheral neuropathy secondary to lupus or diabetes or Sjogren’s. Please consult your doctor regarding this.
